messages.content: Vote Liberal Democrat for a brighter future

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Keith worked to save Yearsley Pool and secure vital local flood defences.
Keith and the Lib Dems have built council homes and fought to protect the green belt.
Keith is the local choice – the Labour and Tory candidates don't live in our constituency.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Only a vote for the Lib Dems can stop the Conservatives here in York Outer.

issues.brexitEurope: They want an MP who will protect our NHS, fight for a fairer deal and give people the final say on Brexit.
issues.health: They want an MP who will protect our NHS.

community.content: Keith worked to save Yearsley Pool and secure vital local flood defences.

leaflet.personalStatement: Local Council Leader Keith Aspden has been selected as the Liberal Democrat candidate for York Outer. Keith is a qualified history teacher and has been a local councillor since 2003.

images.caption: Right across the UK, Jo Swinson's Liberal Democrats are winning and gaining momentum.

examples: Gained over 700 new councillors in May's local elections.
Beat Labour and the Conservatives in May's European Elections.
The Lib Dem fightback is real and it's changing everything.
They want an MP who will protect our NHS, fight for a fairer deal and give people the final say on Brexit.
Only the Lib Dems can beat the Conservatives.
Keith worked to save Yearsley Pool and secure vital local flood defences.
Keith and the Lib Dems have built council homes and fought to protect the green belt.
Keith is the local choice – the Labour and Tory candidates don't live in our constituency.
They want an MP who will protect our NHS, fight for a fairer deal and give people the final say on Brexit.
Beat Labour and the Conservatives in May's European Elections.
The Conservatives in York voted against protecting our local libraries – a service the Lib Dems have doubled.

nonPolicyAttributes.localness: Keith is a local choice – the Labour and Tory candidates don't live in our constituency.
nonPolicyAttributes.employment: Keith is a qualified history teacher.

examples: Keith is a qualified history teacher and has been a local councillor since 2003.
